challenges.title: Olympian Odyssey
challenges.description: Scale the heights of Mount Olympus with the greatest works of ancient Greece. From Homer's epics to Plato's philosophy, become a true scholar of the classical world.

challenges.title: Bard's Best Friend
challenges.description: To read, or not to read? That is the question. Answer it by devouring the complete works of the greatest playwright in history.

challenges.title: Victorian Virtuoso
challenges.description: Step into the gaslit streets of 19th century England. From Dickens to the Bront√´s, experience the golden age of the novel.

challenges.title: Cosmic Connoisseur
challenges.description: Journey to the stars and beyond with the masters of science fiction. From Wells to Asimov, explore the infinite possibilities of the future.

challenges.title: Sherlock's Successor
challenges.description: Elementary, my dear reader! Solve the greatest mysteries in literature and become a detective of the written word.

challenges.title: Verse Voyager
challenges.description: Let your soul dance with the rhythm of words. From sonnets to free verse, discover the music of language.

challenges.title: Realm Runner
challenges.description: Escape to worlds of magic and wonder. From Tolkien to modern masters, traverse the realms of fantasy.

challenges.title: Velocity Virtuoso
challenges.description: Read 10 books in 30 days and prove that speed and comprehension can coexist in perfect harmony.

challenges.title: Cultural Compass
challenges.description: Expand your horizons by reading authors from at least 5 different countries and cultures.

challenges.title: Daily Devotee
challenges.description: Read for at least 30 minutes every day for 30 consecutive days. Consistency is the key to literary greatness.
